org.sd.cluster.job
Interface UnitOfWork

All Superinterfaces:
Publishable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractUnitOfWork, IntegerUnitOfWork, StringUnitOfWork
public interface UnitOfWork
extends Publishable

Marker interface to encapsulate a unit of work to perform.

Author:
Spence Koehler

getWorkStatus

Get this unit's work status.

setWorkStatus

void setWorkStatus(WorkStatus workStatus)
Set this unit's work status.

compareAndSetWorkStatus

boolean compareAndSetWorkStatus(WorkStatus expect,
                                WorkStatus update)
Set this unit's work status to the update value iff is current status is as expected.

Returns:
true if the status was as expected and is now updated.

recordFailure

void recordFailure(java.lang.String reason)
Record the failure of this unit of work.

If the reason is null, assume that the unit of work failed because of a "false" return value while being processed in a job and set the work status to FAILED; otherwise, set the work status to ERROR and record the non-null reason.

Parameters:
reason - either null for 'normal' failure or a stack trace signalling error;

getReason

java.lang.String getReason()
Get the reason for this unit of work's error or null if there has been no error.

getSerializedSize

int getSerializedSize()
Get the number of bytes required to serialize this unit of work.
